Game.Name: All Grown Up! - Express Yourself (USA, Europe)
Game.plot: Finally a game made just for girls! Help Angelica with the school newspaper, sing a song with Susie, put together stylin' outfits with Lil, swap information with your best friends, take a vote on a hot topic or use the PDS function to plan your busy week!http://www.gamefaqs.com/portable/gbadvance/home/925094.html
Game.Notes: Finally a game made just for girls! Help Angelica with the school newspaper, sing a song with Susie, put together stylin' outfits with Lil, swap information with your best friends, take a vote on a hot topic or use the PDS function to plan your busy week!
